SetLimit
SetLimit
. Set a limit
Purpose:
Setting the value of the limit(s) specified.
Syntax:
Parameters:
ObjId – a System object identifier (for example: Application for decision, Transaction, Issue structure, etc.)
limitId – an identifier of an instance of the limit within which the work is carried out
sublimIdList – a list of sublimits under which the work is carried out
The SetLimit function sets a specific limit without checking if the object is bound to the limit.
Just to compare, the
ReCalcLimByObj
function sets the limit only for those objects that meet the conditions for binding to the limit.
